categories: Category:Ships of the Open Circle Fleet

nodes.text: During the Clone Wars, a Venator-class Star Destroyer of the Galactic Republic naval forces' Open Circle Fleet served as the flagship of Jedi General Anakin Skywalker. Sometime after the destruction of his original flagship, the Star Destroyer Resolute, Skywalker used a second Venator as the command ship of his task force.

As a Venator-class Star Destroyer, the flagship was equipped with a dorsal hangar bay, which held Low Altitude Assault Transport/infantry gunships, as well as the personal Eta-2 Actis-class light interceptors of Anakin Skywalker and Ahsoka Tano. It was also armed with eight DBY-827 heavy turbolaser turrets (four port, four starboard) and two medium dual turbolaser cannons (one port, one starboard).
